title: Task-Example-Based Language Project Design to Improve Training Efficiency for Elderly Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Project-based language instruction design for elderly learners in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments, considering training efficiency

learning_goals: Design at least three task-example learning materials reflecting the cognitive characteristics of elderly learners
Develop one educational scenario using task examples through collaborative project-based learning
Measure the efficiency of task-example learning via formative assessments and propose at least two improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
